programmes.show_description: Action thriller with Dolph Lundgren. DEA agent tries to bring down a drug syndicate and rescue an undercover operative who has infiltrated the gang.
Western based on true events. Former outlaw Nathaniel Reed's peaceful existence on the Texas frontier is shattered when a vengeful US Marshal starts hunting him down.

Dodger', the spaniel mix, is at the centre of a custody battle between his owners and the family that cared for him while they were unable to.
Threats of wage garnishment, a guilty plea in an auto accident, and alleged auto theft come into play when a mother sues her son.
A self-proclaimed nosy neighbour cares for a woman's Great Dane and is accused of spaying her unnecessarily.
A woman grieves her loss of musical enjoyment when her violin teacher allegedly sells her a subpar violin.
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.
A newlywed sues a bridal-shop owner for delivering an allegedly damaged, custom-made wedding gown.
A teenager insists that she took out a restraining on her ex-girlfriend, but her ex-roommate claims they are still dating and sues her for moving costs.
After serving time, a young man must find a safe place to live. Instead, he is kicked out and accused of being disrespectful.
A young boy is asked to leave the courtroom before things heat up in a case involving a mother protesting her son's lockout after a three-day tenancy.

DI Steve Keogh uncovers secrets in Julian Webb's 1994 murder. DCS Kevin Moore, psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das, and reporter Paul Cheston share insights.
Detectives reveal how they solved the 2013 manslaughter of 8-year-old Ayesha Ali by her mother and her lover. A forensic psychologist explains the twisted relationship between the killers.
When Ray Wright suddenly lost contact with his family, they knew something was wrong. Two days later, his brother confronted an intruder in Ray Wright's home.
The body of a man living under an assumed name is found tied to an anchor. Will his watch and tattoo be enough to identify him?
The inspection of a woman's skull found in a lake reveals she was brutally butchered.

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. A female construction worker finds herself in great danger when she files suit against the company owner.
Action adventure directed by Keanu Reeves, starring Tiger Hu Chen. A rebellious martial arts expert risks corrupting his spirit as he joins an illegal fighting circuit to protect his temple.
Adventure with Taron Egerton. A battle-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander launch an audacious rebellion against the corrupt English crown.
Epic fantasy adventure with Brigitte Nielsen. Armed with a magic sword, a fearless warrior sets out to avenge her family's deaths and stop a murderous queen from using a powerful talisman.
Hammer horror. When a plague spreads through a Cornish village, it is discovered that the victims' graves are empty and a deranged Squire dabbling in black magic has an army of zombies.

The Judge learns about a new dog breed when an 8-year-old boy is allegedly attacked by a neighbour's pet.
A man has buyer's remorse after spending over $8,000 on furniture; the salesperson points to a 'no-refund' policy clearly printed on the receipt.
A woman is accused of stealing from the estate of an 80-year-old woman and then selling her furniture; she sues for slander and defamation.
An elderly landlord calls the police because she fears a tenant has been a victim of terrible violence; alleged alcoholism and a police witness come into play.
A man sues his adopted son's sister for parking tickets, impound fees and an unpaid loan for a car that's in his name.
A man accuses his teenage cousin of having a serious drug problem and of vandalizing his property; the teen's mother claims their cousin embarrassed them online.
Burglary, two counts of attempted sex abuse and a mother giving her child up for adoption come into play when unwed parents fight over property.

Cayley Mandadi was a 19-year-old sophomore at Trinity University when she arrived at a hospital in Texas in 2017. She was nearly naked, bruised and wasn't breathing.
In separate incidents, Britney Gulley and her friend Jeremisha Adams murder two men in cold blood and blind another with a shotgun blast to the face.
The body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. She's been stabbed 39 times. Her boyfriend Cliff Youens turned cutting remarks into a knife-wielding rage.
In April 1995, Louise Ellis leaves her Ottawa home to spend the weekend with her ex-boyfriend and his daughter in the Gatineau Hills. She is never seen again.
When 72-year-old Toronto resident Harley Walker went missing, his worried friend Greg Seale walked to Harley's house and found a stranger opening the door.

A man's intense yearning for his youth turns him into a boy again.
Action thriller with Owen Wilson. An American family moves to Asia, but faces a fight for survival when a revolution sweeps the country and the new government seeks to eliminate foreigners
Thriller with Clive Owen. An Interpol agent and a district attorney risk their lives to bring to light the vast range of illegal activities being carried out by a major international bank.
